page.title: 03HOUSING
page.content: Of the houses surveyed there were 35 houses, 6 bungalows, 1 flat, 1 farm and 3 others (pubs, hotel, etc.). Of these properties 19 were detached, 21 semi-detached and 6 terraced. 35 were privately owned, 11 rented, and 1 tied. 25 have a garage, 21 have no garage. 45 have a garden, 1 has no garden. 31 of the properties are stone built, 13 are brick and rendered. (2 unsure). NUMBER OF BEDROOMS. 1 had 8 bedrooms. 29 had 3 bedrooms. 3 had 5 bedrooms. 4 had 2 bedrooms. 9 had 4 bedrooms. 1 had 1 bedrooms. DATE OF BUILDING. 1400 _ 1499 1; 1800 _ 1899 14; 1500 _ 1599 1; 1900 _ 1944 2; 1600 _ 1699 2; 1945 _ NOW 13; 1700 _ 1799 8; (UNKNOWN) 6:
